Title: Ladies Rotary crystal slim stainless steel bracelet watch LB02570/01
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Ladies Rotary crystal slim stainless steel bracelet watch LB02570/01 RRP £165.00 Now £115.00 Description This slim ladies Rotary watch LB02570/01 is a classic and stylish design that can be worn for any occasion. It comes with a lifetime Rotary warranty, ensuring that this timeless design can be worn for many years to come. The round white dial of this ladies Rotary watch LB02570/01 is very clear and easy to read with silver coloured batons and hands, and just the Rotary logo in black. The face is protected by a mineral glass lens and surrounded by a sparkling, crystal-set bezel. The case is stainless steel and measures approximately 27mm wide including the crown. The traditional brick link bracelet is also stainless steel and secures with a push-button folding deployment clasp clasp. The silver coloured bracelet of this Rotary watch LB02570/01 is quite slim, measuring 12mm wide. Chapelle Jewellery are authorised Rotary stockists and all of our Rotary watches, including this LB02570/01 model, are supplied in official packaging with Rotary's lifetime guarantee, which can be kept validated by three year services. This watch has been rated waterproof according to Rotary's 'Dolphin Standard'.
